SENT.plain: F-FDG PET/CT on a 23-year-old woman with aplastic anemia and left periorbital swelling showed FDG-avid lesions in the head and neck
The lesions were confirmed to be mucormycosis histologically after F-FDG PET/CT-guided biopsy
Antifungal therapy was adjusted with serial follow-up F-FDG PET/CT until complete patient recovery
F-FDG PET/CT is valuable in the diagnosis and management of mucormycosis
